GeneDef.label: archiver
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites that are capable of completely rewriting the carrier, creating an alternative version of it.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Creates a <color=#b0bf80>duplicate</color> that can be used as a <color=#8a8ae6>form</color>.
For each <color=#8a8ae6>form</color>, all genes, clothing, relationships, etc. are separate.
